languages.text: Отряд Вольного Торговца рассеялся по Темному городу. Воссоединившись со спутниками, Лорд-капитан увеличит свои шансы на успешное бегство из Комморры.

The Lord Captain's squad has been scattered throughout the Dark City. By reuniting with {mf|his|her} lost companions, the Lord Captain will increase {mf|his|her} chances of successfully escaping Commorragh.
languages.original_text: Отряд Вольного Торговца рассеялся по Темному городу. Воссоединившись со спутниками, Лорд-капитан увеличит свои шансы на успешное бегство из Комморры.

traits.locale_text: Lord Captain's squad was scattered around the Dark City. By reuniting with the lost companions, Lord Captain will raise the chances of successfully escaping Commorragh.

The Lord Captain's squad has been scattered throughout the Dark City. By reuniting with {mf|his|her} lost companions, the Lord Captain will increase {mf|his|her} chances of successfully escaping Commorragh.

The Lord Captain's squad has been scattered throughout the Dark City. By reuniting with {mf|his|her} lost companions, the Lord Captain will increase {mf|his|her} chances of successfully escaping Commorragh.

languages.text: L'escouade {mf|du seigneur-capitaine|de la seigneure-capitaine} a été dispersée à travers la cité Crépusculaire. En retrouvant ses compagnons disparus, {mf|il|elle} aura de plus grandes chances de s'échapper de Commorragh.
languages.original_text: The Lord Captain's squad has been scattered throughout the Dark City. By reuniting with {mf|his|her} lost companions, the Lord Captain will increase {mf|his|her} chances of successfully escaping Commorragh.

traits.locale_text: L'escouade {mf|du seigneur-capitaine|de la seigneure-capitaine} a été dispersée à travers la cité Crépusculaire. En retrouvant ses compagnons disparus, {mf|il|elle} aura de plus grandes chances de s'échapper de Commorragh.

languages.text: 行商浪人的整支小队失散在了黑暗之城。行商浪人需要找到失去的同伴，从而争取活着逃离科摩罗的机会。
languages.original_text: The Lord Captain's squad has been scattered throughout the Dark City. By reuniting with {mf|his|her} lost companions, the Lord Captain will increase {mf|his|her} chances of successfully escaping Commorragh.

traits.locale_text: 行商浪人的整支小队失散在了黑暗之城。行商浪人需要找到失去的同伴，从而争取活着逃离科摩罗的机会。

languages.text: ロード・キャプテンの部隊は仄暗き都全域に散在している。行方不明の仲間と再会することで、ロード・キャプテンはコモラフ脱出を成功させる可能性が高まることだろう。
languages.original_text: The Lord Captain's squad has been scattered throughout the Dark City. By reuniting with {mf|his|her} lost companions, the Lord Captain will increase {mf|his|her} chances of successfully escaping Commorragh.

traits.locale_text: ロード・キャプテンの部隊は仄暗き都全域に散在している。行方不明の仲間と再会することで、ロード・キャプテンはコモラフ脱出を成功させる可能性が高まることだろう。

languages.text: Der Trupp des Lord Captains ist in der gesamten Dunklen Stadt verstreut. Wenn der Lord Captain seine verschwundenen Gefährten wiederfindet, wird es leichter, aus Commorragh zu entkommen.
languages.original_text: The Lord Captain's squad has been scattered throughout the Dark City. By reuniting with {mf|his|her} lost companions, the Lord Captain will increase {mf|his|her} chances of successfully escaping Commorragh.

traits.locale_text: Der Trupp des Lord Captains ist in der gesamten Dunklen Stadt verstreut. Wenn der Lord Captain seine verschwundenen Gefährten wiederfindet, wird es leichter, aus Commorragh zu entkommen.

languages.text: La unidad de{mf|l| la} Lord Capitán está dispersa por la Ciudad Siniestra. Al reunirse con sus compañeros, {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán aumentará considerablemente sus probabilidades de escapar de Commorragh.
languages.original_text: The Lord Captain's squad has been scattered throughout the Dark City. By reuniting with {mf|his|her} lost companions, the Lord Captain will increase {mf|his|her} chances of successfully escaping Commorragh.

traits.locale_text: La unidad de{mf|l| la} Lord Capitán está dispersa por la Ciudad Siniestra. Al reunirse con sus compañeros, {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán aumentará considerablemente sus probabilidades de escapar de Commorragh.

languages.text: Lord Kaptan'ın ekibi, Kara Şehir'e farklı yanlarına dağıldı. Lord Kaptan, kayıp yoldaşlarıyla yeniden buluşarak Commorragh'tan başarıyla kurtulma şansını artıracak.
languages.original_text: The Lord Captain's squad has been scattered throughout the Dark City. By reuniting with {mf|his|her} lost companions, the Lord Captain will increase {mf|his|her} chances of successfully escaping Commorragh.
